item.name: Duckville Working Permit (totally, 100% legitimate)
item.desc: Allows the user to work and get paid for their work. Valid within Duckville.

item.name: Work Permit
item.desc: Allows you to use Working Machines.

item.name: Camp Report
item.desc: A report about camping in Duckville, prepared by the Head Camping Overseer.

item.name: Robot Processing Unit
item.desc: Heavily scratched and scuffed, seems to be used.

item.name: High Security Access Card
item.desc: Grants access to High Security areas.

item.name: Security Report
item.desc: A report about security in Duckville, prepared by the Head of Security.

item.name: Exit Key
item.desc: Lets you get through the first round of barricades to Duck City. Not to be confused with an Exit Permit.

item.name: Scrap Metal
item.desc: Was something useful at some point in its life.
